Ingredients.2: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Grease a 6-cavity donut pan with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Whisk eggs in a large bowl until consistent and no egg whites are visible. Whisk in salt and pepper. Pour eggs into the donut pan, dividing evenly amongst the 6 cavities.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until the egg rounds are set and puffed up, 10 to 12 minutes.

Directions.4: While cooking, split the bagels and place on a lined baking sheet. Top one half of each bagel with cheese. Bake until golden brown and the cheese is melted, 4 to 5 minutes.

Directions.5: Run a knife along the edge of the donut pan to remove the egg rounds, then place one on each bagel half. Top with hot sauce, if desired. Serve immediately.
